p: During the last 15 years hundreds of chemical compounds of different classes have been elaborated as potential inhibitors of ATPase/helicase of DDX3 helicase [ 41, 42, 43, 44, 116, 117]. Herein, we focus our attention only on the most active and nontoxic compounds inhibiting DDX3 helicase as well as blocking virus replication or suppressing tumor progression.
